definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: It's possible that nightly nicotine withdrawal could be causing you to toss and turn.
sentences.chinese: 可能是因爲尼古丁的殘留物在夜間會使你輾轉反側。

sentences.english: Chew the gum slowly until it tingles.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢咀嚼尼古丁含片，直到感覺發麻。

sentences.english: and those with high levels were considered regular smokers.
sentences.chinese: 尼古丁和可替寧含量高的被視爲“老菸民”。

sentences.english: Nicotine marks stained his chin and fingers.
sentences.chinese: 尼古丁漬染黃了他的下巴和手指。

sentences.english: A mother who smokes can also pass nicotine to her baby through her breast milk.
sentences.chinese: 吸菸的母親還有可能通過餵母乳把尼古丁傳給嬰兒。

sentences.english: But the thing that gets you hooked on the whole vaporous cocktail is nicotine.
sentences.chinese: 但是讓你沉迷於這種“氣體雞尾酒”的是尼古丁。

sentences.english: The smoker inhales doses of nicotine vaporized with the help of a solvent such as propylene glycol.
sentences.chinese: 尼古丁溶解在丙二醇等溶劑中，揮發後被吸菸者吸入。

sentences.english: D. Nonsmokers can get the disease from breathing other people's tobacco smoke.
sentences.chinese: 不吸菸人羣會通過吸入其他吸菸者的尼古丁患上該病。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of nicotine on the proliferation of microglia .
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察尼古丁對小膠質細胞增殖的影響。

sentences.english: Have your nicotine-replacement products or other aids ready.
sentences.chinese: 準備好尼古丁替代品或其他方法。

sentences.english: They found that there was no level of nicotine or cotinine that did not also correlate with genetic abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現零尼古丁或可替寧水平也與基因異常不相關。

sentences.english: That study also found that the water in hookahs filters out less than 5 percent of the nicotine.
sentences.chinese: 該研究還發現水煙中的水只能過濾掉5%的尼古丁。

sentences.english: I think it's time to change somebody's nicotine patch.
sentences.chinese: 好了，我認爲有人該換尼古丁貼片了。

sentences.english: I only smoke cigarettes with a low nicotine content.
sentences.chinese: 我只抽尼古丁含量低的香菸。

sentences.english: His teeth were stained with nicotine from years of smoking.
sentences.chinese: 他的牙齒因多年吸菸而被尼古丁染黃了。

sentences.english: It has been reported that nicotine can promote certain intra-cellular signaling in lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，尼古丁能促進肺癌某些細胞內信號傳導。

definition: variant of 菸鹼|菸碱[yan1 jian3]/nicotine
alcohol/ethanol CH3CH2OH/ethyl alcohol/also written 乙醇/grain alcohol
